title: Darius is so bad that hes obliged to go ghost flash to try and compensate
body:
http://na.op.gg/champion/darius/statistics/top

Which makes him even worse in higher elos where top is obliged to go tp. He really feels like shit to play as.

replies.body:
Darius doesn't need any buffs. He's just shit in this current meta, but the moment adc's aren't the god overlords of league he'll be fine again.

Don't get me wrong, I love Darius. I want him to be decent again, he's one of my favorite champions to play. The only issue is that if you try to give him compensation buffs in this meta that shits on him, he'll just be a monster when the meta shifts and he'll be overnerfed
